sentences.sContent: Special dynamic screen the discharge design, the rotor high speed centrifugal separation system, Super flow.
sentences.sContent_eng: Special dynamic screen the discharge design, the rotor high speed centrifugal separation system, Super flow.
sentences.sCn: 特殊的动态筛网出料设计，转子高速离心分离系统，实现超级流量。

sentences.sContent: The research is made on dewaxing shellac by centrifugal subside and refining shellac-wax by Carbon tetrachloride extraction.
sentences.sContent_eng: The research is made on dewaxing shellac by centrifugal subside and refining shellac-wax by Carbon tetrachloride extraction.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了用离心沉降对紫胶脱蜡和四氯化碳萃取精制紫胶蜡的研究过程和结果。

sentences.sContent: The result of the study, which was carried out by a Steel Corporation in Japan, on the granulation of coke breeze by using centrifugal rolling type pelletizer is introduced.
sentences.sContent_eng: The result of the study, which was carried out by a Steel Corporation in Japan, on the granulation of coke breeze by using centrifugal rolling type pelletizer is introduced.
sentences.sCn: 本文介绍了国外某钢铁公司研究与开发实验室关于使用离心转动型造球机对烧结用焦粉制粒的研究成果。

trans.tranOther: acting, moving, or tending to move away from a centre
